title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about an almond tree in a dream

preview.html: Almonds are one of the unique types of nuts that have many benefits. Almonds are often bought in stores, but seeing almonds can be a rare thing because they are not common, so seeing an almond tree in a dream seems to be a confusing vision for many people, and this is what we will explain in detail. Interpretation of sunset in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an almond tree in A dream for a single woman: The tonsils that an unmarried girl saw indicate that this girl will marry a well-off man with good financial conditions. Large almonds in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate that many positive changes will occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing peeled almonds in an unmarried girl’s dream means This girl will achieve most of her dreams and goals without putting in much effort and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing the dream in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about almonds for a pregnant woman? A group of dream interpreters believes that the appearance of almonds in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that this woman will give birth to a male child, God willing. Almonds in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicate that a lot of goodness and abundance will arrive for this woman once she gives birth to her next child, God willing. A pregnant woman eating peeled almonds indicates that this woman will give birth naturally without health problems and difficult problems, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a peacock in a dream A dream about eating green almonds in a dream for a single woman. A girl who sees herself eating green almonds in a dream can graduate from her studies this year with unparalleled distinction. A girl who eats green almonds indicates that she may be at the beginning of her journey to make her dreams come true. Green almonds for an unmarried girl. A married woman, who suffers from heartache and anxiety, indicates her relief and the arrival of happy news for this girl. Interpretation of seeing a drink in a dream. Dreaming of an almond heart. An almond heart in a young man’s dream indicates the marriage of that young man to a girl of lineage and lineage in addition to beauty. As for the man who sees an almond heart In a dream, it is one of the signs that this man will give birth to a male child, God willing, from his wife. The heart of an almond in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer enjoys a state of stability and inner peace for that person. The heart of an almond in a divorced woman’s dream indicates that many changes will occur. Better for her and her children after the divorce in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an injection in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about green almonds for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that green almonds, especially for a married woman, indicates the abundance of a halal diet that will come this woman’s way. Almonds could be Green is a sign that the dreamer will recover from any illness or health problem she suffered in the past few days. If the dreamer is currently working, green almonds may portend her obtaining a better position in this job. Interpretation of a dream about rubbing hair and eyebrows in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a tree Almonds in a dream: The almonds that appear in a man’s dream indicate the end of all enmity between that man and his friends or relatives. The almond tree appears in front of the owner’s house.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing peanuts in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream in detail. The dreamer sees peanuts in a dream in many ways, and does not know the meaning of this dream, which is sometimes strange, but according to the consensus of interpreters, it is beneficial to its owner. Read also: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in Dream in detailMany interpreters also report that seeing peanuts in a dream is good for its owner, so in order to get peeled peanuts, you have to make an effort to get what you want. Read also: Pumpkin in a dream. Interpretation of a man seeing peanuts. The interpretation of dreams as told by interpreters varies depending on the condition of the person who sees this dream. If it is a man, he has an interpretation, and if a woman also has her interpretation, then the interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream is in the details for the man: Seeing a man buying peanuts. The man sees that he is buying peanuts in his dream, and he cannot explain that, but the interpretation scholars said that this dream is good news. It is pleasant for its owner that he will reap what he worked hard for, and enjoy peace and comfort after the difficulty. They pursued him. Seeing a man planting peanuts. A man can see in his dream that he is planting peanuts. Scientists have said in interpreting this that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness and perhaps a job or scholarship awaits him. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Seeing a man giving him peanuts. Interpretation of a man’s vision that someone gives him peanuts and he eats peanuts. Interpretation scholars said - as stated in their books - that this man will marry soon, and in this marriage he will have a livelihood. Seeing a man distributing peanuts, and a man appears in his pajamas distributing peanuts, and in the interpretation of that he said Scholars: This man gives what is permissible as charity and the like in reward. Interpretation of a single woman’s vision of peanuts. As we mentioned, scholars differ in interpreting movies, as they mentioned in their books, according to the type of dreamer, as well as his marital status. The dream of a married woman is different from that of a single woman. Here is the interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream in detail for a single woman: Seeing a single woman buying peanuts Scientists said that if an unmarried woman sees herself buying peanuts, the interpretation of this is that she will finally get what she wants after hard work. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in Dreaming about seeing single women planting peanuts. An unmarried woman can be seen planting or harvesting peanuts, and interpretation scholars have reported that she will get what she asks for, whether it is in a job or marriage. Interpretation of a married woman’s vision of peanutsInterpretation scholars believe that the reality of a woman’s marriage is different from her being unmarried, Also, whether this woman is a mother or is still pregnant or otherwise, the interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream in detail for a married woman: Read also: Washing the dead Seeing a married woman buying peanuts In interpreting this, scholars said that she will live in her house abundantly to improve her husband’s work and increase

title: What is the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: Seeing fire in a dream Seeing fire in a dream is a frightening dream for many, causing them anxiety and distress, and they immediately search for its interpretation. For the worse, we will learn about the best interpretations that came from seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq. In the event that a lady sees fire in general, Imam Al-Sadiq saw that it indicates the approaching pregnancy, especially if the lady desires it for a long time. And if he sees it shining around her, bright, high and growing, then this indicates the emergence of some problems and disagreements for the woman, which are dangerous between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a fire without smoke: If he sees it and does not have smoke, then it is something desirable, and indicates the coming of goodness, or a lot of Sustenance and money, and it may indicate gaining material gain or profit from trade. Also, worshiping fire in a dream by a married woman indicates the approaching war or distance from worship and distance from God Almighty, as Imam Al-Sadiq said, it indicates the distance between performing prayer or implementing the program. late or committed. Some sins in a dream, her life, and she must repent for them. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the interpretations of dreams. Seeing fire and fire in the house in a dream. If you see her in her house being crushed and burned, this means that there are many changes in life that affect her greatly, Whether it is good or bad, it indicates that it will pass a new stage in the future. When you see fires consuming all parts of the house and they try to extinguish them, this is a change in general, but she rejects it or commits some sins and disobedience, but her approach is repentance, God willing, and it is atonement. For a sin and repentance for what many scholars saw. And when you see her leaving her house, but there is no dust or smoke, it is a sign of Hajj in the near future or performing Umrah rituals, and it is a welcome vision in the lady’s dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a star in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, there are many interpretations, which are conveyed through seeing the stars in a dream, and the dreamer sometimes shows the next good thing in the dreamer’s life, but at other times, it indicates evil or the emergence of problems, or wounding a person. With concern, and therefore the interpretation of seeing a lion is considered one of the important interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It should be noted that Ibn Sirin is one of the most important scholars of interpretation in the Islamic religion, and therefore he dealt with many interpretations related to the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream, as well as according to what was interpreted Based on the verses of the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet: Therefore, seeing a lion in a dream indicates purity and purity in many dreams and visions. However, seeing a man’s saddle in a dream means that he will marry a pious and righteous girl. On the other hand, seeing a lion in a dream , for an unmarried girl, it appears to me, and it shows her marriage. Therefore, seeing a white lion, in a mourning dream, is a sign of a young man who respects morals. In addition, seeing lions in a dream for a married woman indicates her husband, and the more extensive the matter The more her husband provides her with a lot of sustenance. If a married woman sees that she is sewing a saddle, this indicates the correction of her husband’s faults. On the other hand, seeing an asdalos in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the birth of a healthy child, if she sees a green or... White. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brother in a brother’s dream according to interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream wearing a brown lion in a dream. It should be noted that the interpretation of seeing a brown irregular heartbeat in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires in addition to the happiness that will come to the dreamer’s life, but shades of brown Different. Next: In general, the color brown indicates the fulfillment of desires, in addition to indicating successes. Aside from the sign of the color brown in the dream, it indicates marriage, so seeing a brown lion wearing a sign means marriage. In addition, seeing a brown lion in A dream for a single girl indicates success in her life. But if a man sees in his dream that there is a woman wearing brown saddles, this is a sign of the upcoming diet in his life. Therefore, if a married woman is wearing a brown saddle, this is evidence of happiness in her married life. In addition, seeing a divorced woman with brown hair indicates the nearness of happiness in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about kissing the king in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a blue lion in a dream. In addition, seeing the color blue in a dream in general indicates success and success in life. In addition to dreaming of good news about the good coming in the dreamer’s life, in addition to seeing a woman wearing blue eyelids is a sign of good news: pregnancy, livelihood, work, etc. In addition, seeing a blue lion in a man’s dream is a sign of sustenance and success

title: Interpretation of a dream about a new job or work in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a job or a new job in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and since work and a job in real life are considered many good things that a person seeks, the person wonders if in dreams the same thing, more at that time is a sign of happiness, but there are many premonitions existing. Leaving something and getting close to doing good or continuing to do something, and the dream is from the devil, and through our article this is what we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about a new job or job and all the interpretations related to it. Seeing a new workplace in a dream for single peopleDreams are considered the most disturbing for people and it is He is looking for the correct interpretation to ease his heart and make sure that goodness comes into his life, and the correct interpretation of obtaining a job or work in one dream explains the following: Seeing a job in one dream bodes well, but the evil of seeing it when an unmarried woman accepts a job that she wants very much indicates She will suffer a great loss and she will not be able to escape from it with any ease, but she is depressed and sad because of it. It is not a short period, but in the end it will pass and goodness will come after it. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is unemployed and cannot be accepted, work, or work, this means great success, development, and a great and bright future awaits her. If an unmarried woman sees that companies accept her to work with them This does not indicate kindness, but rather that she will soon leave her job and the problems she faces at work. If an unmarried woman sees that the job she desires is unacceptable, this indicates that she will achieve what she wants in the near future and live a peaceful life, satisfying her desires, and full of happiness and prosperity. See also: Interpretation of a dream about long black hair by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. The job dreamed of by a married and pregnant woman. The dream of work and work has many interpretations and gossip, some of which are good and some of which are bad and should be avoided, but these interpretations determine the symbols in the fortuneteller’s dream and the interpretation of the dream of work in the dream of A - married woman. As follows: If a married woman sees that she has accepted a job, this indicates that she will lose those close to her in her life and will suffer for a long time, but she will get used to this loss. If a married woman dreams in her sleep that she sees in front of her the job that she wants, this means that she will achieve what she desires and will live for long periods. Of peace, prosperity and happiness. If a married woman sees that she wants work and it is out of reach and she is employed in it, this portends an unexpected loss and great inconvenience to her, but she will soon finish and feel comfortable after that. A pregnant woman who wants and desires work and does not accept it shows goodness for her And for her child, and success in her life and a peaceful birth. A pregnant woman wants to work in a company and was not accepted despite her many efforts, but acceptance in the end shows that she is suffering from a huge loss that affects her greatly. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she wants to work in a company and cooperate with it, It indicates that she left her job and stuck with him. See also: Interpretation of the dream for

title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of buying a watch in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of buying a wristwatch in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, there are many dreams that we have in a dream, and since each of these dreams that we have in a dream has different interpretations and connotations related to it, and among these dreams is a dream in which you see a wristwatch and it is considered one of the visions that indicate... Many different meanings, interpretations, and connotations, and therefore the interpretation of the dream varies according to the state and circumstances of the dreamer, and so that the interpretation of the dream of a wristwatch in the dream of an unmarried girl is completely different from its interpretation in the dream of a married woman, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of buying a wristwatch in a dream for a son. Sirin and everything related to it in terms of interpretations and interpretations from the most famous scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We also know that the scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars of interpretation as he has many different interpretations and interpretations and because he interpreted many different dreams and his interpretations were based on many Details about the dream as well as social. Among the most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin, the dreamer, of seeing a wristwatch in a dream is the following: If the person with the vision buys a watch in a dream, then this vision is a sign of goodness and the fulfillment of all the desires that he seeks to achieve. But if his vision is of buying a silver watch, then this vision is an indication of... His righteousness and closeness to God Almighty. While if she sees a black wristwatch in a dream, this is a sign of the return of a missing person from her, whether he is a lover or a relative. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a teacher he loved in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and divorced women. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream for a woman SinglenessEach of a girl's dreams has its own interpretations and interpretations, as they are interpreted based on many details related to the dream, as well as the dreamer's state when he sees the dream. A wristwatch in an unmarried girl’s dream is read as follows: If an unmarried girl sees a wristwatch in her dream, then this vision is an indication that she will soon get the good husband she wants. And because if he sees a wristwatch with a beautiful shape in a dream, then this vision is a sign of Happiness and great stability in the dreamer's life in the near future will see this vision. As for seeing a golden watch in an unmarried girl's dream, it is a sign of the great joy that she will feel the moment she sees this vision. See also: Interpretation of dreams about the growth of toes and hands in A dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wristwatch in a dream for a married woman. As it is known that interpretations of dreams differ depending on the social status in which the dreamer is, this means that dream interpretations in a married woman’s dream differ greatly from a dream of an unmarried girl, because the details of life differ between them and many Other details related to the dreamer’s condition, whether social or psychological, and the most important interpretations of the dream of seeing a wristwatch in a married woman’s dream are as follows: Seeing a wristwatch in a married woman’s dream is a sign of an increase in her work and responsibilities. Whereas

Sirin and everything related to it in terms of interpretations and interpretations from the most famous scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We also know that the scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous scholars of interpretation as he has many different interpretations and interpretations and because he interpreted many different dreams and his interpretations were based on many Details about the dream as well as social. Among the most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin, the dreamer, of seeing a wristwatch in a dream is the following: If the person with the vision buys a watch in a dream, then this vision is a sign of goodness and the fulfillment of all the desires that he seeks to achieve. But if his vision is of buying a silver watch, then this vision is an indication of... His righteousness and closeness to God Almighty. While if she sees a black wristwatch in a dream, this is a sign of the return of a missing person from her, whether he is a lover or a relative. And because if he sees a wristwatch with a beautiful shape in a dream, then this vision is a sign of Happiness and great stability in the dreamer's life in the near future will see this vision. As for seeing a golden watch in an unmarried girl's dream, it is a sign of the great joy that she will feel the moment she sees this vision. Whoever dreams that he traveled to a secluded place in a dream, may indicate rejection of the sins and disobedience that he did by the grace of God. In the event that one believes that they went to the island, this may indicate their feeling of loneliness and isolation during this Time. Seeing yourself traveling to an island in a dream may indicate some disputes that the dreamer faced in those days. Seeing yourself traveling to an island in a dream could indicate some wrong decisions that the dreamer made during his life during this time, and God knows best. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a lion attacking in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a lion attacking in a dream. Lions are a type of animal with strong bodies and claws, and are found in southern and northern Africa. It is also true that seeing a lion attack in a dream is complete for a person. Therefore, we have collected for you, our dear followers, what is the interpretation of seeing a lion eating a human being, and also what is the interpretation of seeing a lion eating a human being and attacking people, as well as the interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream, a plate for married women, pregnant women, and men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion attacking me? The interpretation of seeing a full lion attack in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will suffer from injustice from someone. Also, a full lion attack in a dream is an indication that the dreamer should be careful and avoid confrontations with others. This vision also has many meanings. In the weakness of souls, the feeling of failure and the inability to adapt. Seeing a lion attacking someone in a dream also indicates the battles that people will face in their lives. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream full of a woman’s pot: Seeing a lion in a dream full of a woman’s pot is evidence that he will marry a strong and dominant personality. Also, to see a lion attacking a woman in a dream full of pot, it means that someone will hurt her. What is the interpretation of seeing lions and being afraid of them indicates their fear of romantic relationships. To dream of playing with a lion is a good omen and a sign that you will enjoy a successful relationship. Seeing a lion in a dream full With a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream full of a married woman is a sign of a strong and loving relationship. Seeing a lion in a dream of a married woman symbolizes a strong and controlling husband. Seeing a lion in a dream full of a married woman indicates that God will take care of her pregnancy and children. What is the interpretation of seeing a peaceful lion? The interpretation of dreams of seeing a peaceful and calm lion in a complete dream shows calm, stability of life and decent living. Seeing many lions in a complete dream is one of the visions of a powerful life and reaching the highest peaks. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion eating a man? It indicates Seeing a lion eating a stranger in a dream is a sign of great relief for the dreamer to see in his life. If you see a lion eating a whole part of a person in a dream, this indicates excessive exhaustion, lack of resourcefulness, and inability to face things. A lion attacking a person and getting hurt in a dream is a complete indication of... The sadness and stress that he is experiencing. A lion bite in a dream is complete. The interpretation of a dream that a lion bites someone in his dream is evidence that he has been harmed by a close person. A lion bite in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and a sign of betrayal and stabbing in the back. Seeing a lion Being bitten and bleeding is a sign of comfort and getting rid of undeserving people. What is the interpretation of seeing a lion running after me? Seeing a lion running after a man in a dream, and him running away from him, is a sign of coming out of a state of fatigue and sadness. The interpretation of seeing a lion chasing a person and hitting him in his dream is a sign On the deception and deception that he will be exposed to. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and it will connect

title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl while I was single in a dream and its most important indicators

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl and I was alone in the dream and its most important meanings, as it is one of the strange dreams that a single woman dreams of and makes her anxious, which prompts her to search for an explanation related to it. Because seeing that I gave birth to a girl while I was single is strange because she is not married and cannot have children, interpretive scholars have put forward a group of interpretations related to the vision, especially since it varied according to social status. From the dreamer, in addition to the circumstances that passed and the revelation present in the dream, and here in our article we will learn about you and you about me. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl and I was alone with her. The dream and its most important connotations. I dreamed that I gave birth to a girl while I was single in the dream and its most important indicators. There are many interpretations that came in a dream about I gave birth to a girl while I was not pregnant in the dream. It is one of the disturbing dreams that prompts the dreamer to search for the interpretation related to it, and we present it to you. Some of them are: A group of translators mentioned that the birth of a girl in a dream is a sign of abundant sustenance for all family members, especially since the girl is the one whose parents will enter Paradise through her righteous upbringing, so seeing her in a dream, especially if she is beautiful, is a good vision. Also, if she sees If an unmarried girl gives birth to a girl in her dream, this is evidence of the loss of worries and sorrows. It is a sign of comfort, joy, and abundance of sustenance, in addition to a sign. Of removing difficulties, it is a sign of a return to reward and indicates that the dreamer will marry someone soon. Also, if a married woman sees that she has given birth to a girl in a dream, this is a sign that she will be heralded with happiness, and this is also a sign that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. I dreamed that I She gave birth to a girl and breastfed her. It is worth noting that girls dream of many strange dreams, and the dream in which a girl gave birth and breastfed her is mentioned as one of the praiseworthy dreams that carry good news from the priest, and it also carries a number of clues mentioned. By scholars of interpretation, including: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding her newborn, this indicates good news for the husband who will be good for her, just as if the woman who had this vision was engaged, then this indicates the approaching date of her marriage. But if she saw that she was breastfeeding a girl in her dream, this indicates illness, but you will recover, God willing. Likewise, if a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child in her dream, this means that she will be pregnant, and when she sees in her dream that someone is breastfeeding another person, then this A sign of bad news for her. she has. And when she takes care of a familiar person in a dream, this is a sign that this person will seize her wealth. Moreover, when a woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding an elderly child, this is a sign of sadness, but if she sees that she is breastfeeding from a man’s breast, this is a sign of Poverty. In addition, when a woman sees in a dream that her breasts contain a lot of milk, this is a sign that she will get a lot of money, and when a man sees that he is pleasing a child, this is evidence that he is helping others.

title: Seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream

preview.html: I saw in a dream a non-smoking person smoking, I saw that I was smoking cigars even though I do not smoke in reality, I saw my father smoking and not smoking cigars in reality, I saw a person smoking even though he does not smoke in reality, all these dreams can see us in a dream, and can bring Many, many interpretations that people do not know, so through this article in the encyclopedia for more details. Interpretation of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream: First: Interpretation of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation scholars, including Ibn Sirin, unanimously agree However, smoking in a dream or seeing someone smoking in a dream could be a sign that this person is going through a period of crises, problems, and nervous and psychological pressures. This vision can also indicate excessive stress and discomfort felt by its owner. Ibn Sirin explains that anyone who dreams that he is smoking a cigar or anything else, even though he does not actually smoke, is an indication that the dreamer is trying to stay away from harming others. This person. For anyone who finds himself sitting with a group of smokers but does not smoke, this vision warns them, because it may be a cause of distress to the dreamer, and whoever sees that he no longer smokes, even though in fact he smokes, it is good news that his problems will end and he will succeed in overcoming adversity. Anyone who finds himself smoking in a smoke-free area suffers from problems that are difficult to get rid of. If the fortuneteller finds that the color of the smoke is black, this is a sign of the coming of trouble and disasters for the fortuneteller, and the fortuneteller may portend a great loss, but in the event that the smoke is natural, it is good news. For anyone who sees success in the pursuit of knowledge, work, or trade. Smoking in a dream can indicate corruption of religion and lack of faith, and smoke in this dream is a sign of death from illness or loss on the path of sin, and the dreamer must approach God and repent to Him. It may indicate Smoking reminds others of the evil in their absence, which harms them and harms their feelings, and the vision in this case is a sign of insight that he must stop doing it. In the event that the dreamer does not smoke at all, and in his sleep he finds that he smokes a lot and with pleasure, this means that spoiled offspring It will come out of his body just as smoke comes out of his mouth. Second: Interpretation of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing smoke in a dream is a warning sign of fear of God’s punishment in the afterlife, and if a person sees in his dream that there is thick smoke that obstructs vision, he will develop a fever. And smoke. It may indicate harm to the viewer and those around him. Interpretation of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream for a married and pregnant girl and for a man: First: Interpretation of seeing a non-smoker smoking in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman who does not smoke sees that she is smoking and feels freedom and joy and is not afraid to see her, This is a warning to her that she will be a smoker in reality, God forbid, and she may also participate. In many bad friendships that destroy her life and her happiness may be with them in a dream. An indication that she is practicing tricks and machinations, and perhaps the dream indicates Assa’s illness
